title: Matt Taven
summary: Matthew Marinelli (born March 20, 1985),[1] known by his ring name, Matt Taven, is an American professional wrestler and wrestling trainer. He is working for Ring of Honor (ROH), which he has been a part of since 2012. Taven won the Ring of Honor World Championship in Madison Square Garden in 2019.[4] He also appears for Consejo Mundial de Lucha Libre (CMLL), where he is a former NWA World Historic Welterweight Champion.
